ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen juice concentrate

cookingTips: Sterilize all equipment with sanitizer before starting to prevent contamination
Maintain fermentation temperature between 65-75°F for consistent results
Fermentation typically takes 4-6 weeks; rack the wine when sediment accumulates at bottom
enrichment.coachingPrompt: I want to make wine at home but I'm worried about contamination. What sanitation steps are most important?
